sources.title: The Wall Street Mystery
sources.description: Title: The Wall Street Mystery Summary: The apparent murder of two stockbrokers is solved in quick fashion by Dr. Crabtree. Directed by: Arthur Hurley Actors: Donald Meek, John Hamilton, Frances Dale Production Company: Warner Bros. Release Date: 4 November 1931 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.20 : 1 When the apparent murder of two stockbrokers are discovered in their Wall Street office. Police Inspector Crane summons forensic expert Dr. Crabtree to the crime scene. A beautiful woman found in the closet, a frightened African-American elevator operator, and a suspicious business associate are among the witnesses questioned.

metadata.Plot: When the apparent murder of two stockbrokers are discovered in their Wall Street office. Police Inspector Crane summons forensic expert Dr. Crabtree to the crime scene. A beautiful woman found in the closet, a frightened African-American elevator operator, and a suspicious business associate are among the witnesses questioned.
